item.title: Software security, secure software development in the age of IoT, Smart Things, embedded applications
item.description:
Software security, secure software development in the age of IoT, Smart Things, embedded applications

How to manage secure software development and get Common Criteria certification for smart devices

item.title: Transforming what a car can be
item.description:
Transforming what a car can be

Join Atieva as we create the car of the future, and demonstrate the true advantages of an electric vehicle.

item.title: Amazon's now selling its own brand of ARM processors for the connected home
item.description:
Amazon's now selling its own brand of ARM processors for the connected home

Amazon has officially entered the semiconductor market with the news that it is selling its own-brand of ARM-based chips to manufacturers. U.S. tech companies went transatlantic on more than a few occasions last year in their search for innovation, but one of the more curious cases was when Amazon headed to Israel and snapped up Annapurna Labs for a reported $350 million.

item.title: Smart-Thing Technologies from STMicroelectronics Power PIQ Multi-Sport Wearable Sensor
item.description:
Smart-Thing Technologies from STMicroelectronics Power PIQ Multi-Sport Wearable Sensor

Multiple ST ICs designed-in to perform key functions, boost battery lifetime, and shrink product size By tracking hand and wrist movement in multiple axes for accurate 3D analysis, the PIQ multi-sport sensor helps improve performance and technique.

item.title: Surprise, OS X is the most vulnerable software of 2015 not Adobe Flash
item.description:
Surprise, OS X is the most vulnerable software of 2015 not Adobe Flash

Now that 2015 is behind us we get to look at the most vulnerable software that could put our PC/laptop or smartphone in jeopardy and also leak our personal information. The year had started with the favourite whipping boy of security researchers and cyber security firm, Adobe Flash reporting multiple zero-days and you would you expected it to top the list of most vulnerable software.

item.title: Glimpse into the future.
item.description:
Glimpse into the future.

We design from the inside out. Our goal was to build a car with a sixth sense for its driver's intentions and needs - one with adaptive personalization, seamless transfer of custom vehicle configurations, access to live images, and real time data visualization.

item.title: The Algorithms Are Taking Over: Who Controls Our Online Future?
item.description:
The Algorithms Are Taking Over: Who Controls Our Online Future?

The Internet is devolving from a free forum of ideas to a series of walled gardens where algorithms and a small cadre of elites decide what is acceptable speech online

item.title: LG expects future growth from car electronics and Internet of Things
item.description:
LG expects future growth from car electronics and Internet of Things

LG is working on a wide panoramic information display that can give you a lot of data without compromising safety by putting the data on the glass itself. The smart windshield is one of many displays, appliances, and other devices that the company hopes will supply its future growth.
